scripts.cluster-build: k3d cluster create --config mikrolab/k3d-config.yaml && k3d kubeconfig get local-cluster > mikrolab/kubeconfig.yaml
scripts.cluster-rebuild: npm run cluster-destroy && npm run cluster-build
scripts.cluster-rebuild-argo: npm run cluster-rebuild && sleep 10; kubectl create namespace argocd --kubeconfig mikrolab/kubeconfig.yaml && kubectl apply -n argocd --kubeconfig mikrolab/kubeconfig.yaml -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/argoproj/argo-cd/refs/heads/master/manifests/core-install.yaml --wait
scripts.cluster-rebuild-helmfile: npm run cluster-rebuild && sleep 5; npm run helmfile
scripts.cluster-bootstrap: npm run cluster-install && npm run cluster-rebuild-apply
